Source.Name: perl-HTML-FormatText-WithLinks-AndTables
Source.Summary: HTML'i metne tablolar ile beraber çeviren perl modülü
Source.Description: Bu modül HTML'i metne içersindeki tablolar ile beraber dönüştürür.
Source.Summary: Converts HTML to Text with tables in tact.
Source.Description: This module was inspired by HTML::FormatText::WithLinks which has proven to be a useful `lynx -dump` work-alike.
